term.title: base kind of quantity

item.text: A kind of quantity considered dimensionally independent of other kinds of quantities, i.e. it is not defined by an equation containing other kinds of quantities, e.g. length, mass, amount of substance.

sources.item: PAC, 1979, 51, 2451. 'Quantities and Units in Clinical Chemistry' on page 2459 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197951122451)
